lines.text: I wish I had wings of the dove so I could fly away.
You have a castle too, Lord Mark?
These wretched aristocrats can't even heat their houses.
You're still in love with her.
I was never in love with her.
I'm sorry, Kate. I'm so sorry.
You want me to seduce a dying girl? And what makes you think she'll just leave me all her money?
I know her. I know how she loves.
Every time she smiles, remember that I love you more.
I don't believe in any of the things I write about. I fake passion. I fake conviction.
Try to look as if you've worn it all your life. It's yours.
Do you think he loves you?
She's alive, Kate, more alive than anyone I've ever known.
Promise me - on your honor - that you're not in love with her memory.
